summary: Before he lost his sight. Before he pledged his service to Kublai Khan. Hundred Eyes saw what made him into the deadly assassin who trains Marco Polo.
cast: Benedict Wong|Tom Wu|Lorenzo Richelmy|Olivia Cheng|Michelle Yeoh|Sam Jellie|Masayoshi Haneda|Alfred Loh|Marcus Mok|Sean Kenin
title: Marco Polo: One Hundred Eyes
